SEARCH
Package proj

Class User

java.lang.Object
proj.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Student, Worker
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an user of the mobility service. This class serves as the base for all user types (e.g., Student, Worker) and holds common properties like a mechanical number and payment method. It defines an abstract contract for price calculation and the application of discounts, which must be implemented by subclasses. This class is Serializable to support object persistence.
See Also:

    • User

      public User(String mechNo, String paymentMethod)
      Constructs a new User with a mechanical number and payment method.
      Parameters:
      mechNo - The user's unique mechanical number (e.g., student or employee ID).
      paymentMethod - The user's chosen payment method (e.g., "Credit Card", "PayPal").

    • getValue

      public float[] getValue()
      A generic method to retrieve pricing values. Subclasses should override this to return the correct pricing tier from the values table.
      Returns:
      A float array representing a row from the pricing table.

      Returns:
      The cost per hour in Euros.
